name: webpd
author: SÃ©bastien Piquemal <sebpiq@gmail.com>
description: WebPd is a compiler for audio programming language Pure Data allowing to run .pd patches on web pages.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:runtime && npm run build:dist && npm run build:cli
scripts.build:dev:full: npm run build:dev:deps && npm run link:local && npm run build
scripts.build:dev:deps: cd ../WebPd_compiler && npm run build:dev:full && cd ../WebPd_pd-parser && npm run build:dev:full && cd ../WebPd_runtime && npm run build:dev:full && cd ../WebPd
scripts.link:local: cd ../WebPd_compiler && npm link && cd ../WebPd_pd-parser && npm link && cd ../WebPd_runtime && npm link && cd ../WebPd && npm link @webpd/compiler @webpd/pd-parser @webpd/runtime && cd ../WebPd
scripts.unlink:local: npm unlink @webpd/compiler @webpd/pd-parser @webpd/runtime && cd ../WebPd_compiler && npm unlink . && cd ../WebPd_pd-parser && npm unlink . && cd ../WebPd_runtime && npm unlink . && cd ../WebPd
